turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello Amber, how are you today? I would like you to order me a Venti Iced Latte from Starbucks on University, Avenue in Charlottesville. Will you do that for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sur boss. Are you sure you want the Startbucks on University or the one closer to your office?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I prefer the Universtiy location because I will be there for this meeting and tour.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. When should it be ready?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great question. Let's see. I will be by there in no more than 20 minutes, so please see if it can be ready in 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, So, you want a Venti Iced Latte? Do you want creme and sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I will put my own sugar, they always put too much. Ok, yes I want regular creme.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good to know as they have like six milk choices.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I know right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I am making the order now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thank you. I have an account there, so it can be charged to my existing account.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any time boss. The order is now ready at the Starbucks University location. One venti iced latte without sugar and with creme.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: great. Thanks Amber. I really appreicate it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect. I am doing it now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good deal.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are ready. The order is made and will be ready in 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You can pick up the order in 15 minutes, but if you are running late the order will be made when you get there so the ice does not melt.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great deal. I really appreciate it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anytime. Your receipt will be text to you any moment so you can verify the order before you pick it up.
